summary:
HR systems expert with international experience in a large variety of HR systems, tools and processes, with a drive for continuous improvements. 
Experience in change management, HR business processes improvement, HR business intelligent and knowledge of most of the top of the line HR systems and tools there is a wealth of knowledge to introduce and share.

The obvious answers are sometimes hard to find, but experience in multiple HR disciplines can test the technical boundaries without overcomplicating the usage and impact for the end users.

Other personal keywords are: creative, teamwork, knowledge sharing, bridging cultural differences, integrity and ethics.

school.name: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen

projects.title: Workday Europe Deployment
projects.description:
- Deployment of Workday HCM to 10,000+ users in 26 countries with Self-Service.  
- Co-developed global compensation standardization strategy.

contributors.headline: Senior Principal Services Program Manager at Workday

profile_positions.description: Within the Workday offering we have a special focus on all Workday solutions (HCM and Finance) and all connected solutions like Adaptive, Prism and Peakon. In addition we also advice on systems that complete the HCM landscape like ServiceNow, FieldGlass and integration solutions (point-to-point/middleware) towards downstream system and Payroll solutions.
profile_positions.title: Director

profile_positions.description:
As Specialist Leader I will guide and assist companies in their Workday Journey. In roles as Solution Architect and being part of the functional souding boards I help companies making the right decissions and safeguarding a maintainable and connected overall solution.
2017 - Solution Architect Marquard & Bahls (Germany)
2017 - Solution Architect Nilfisk (Denmark)
2017 - Solution Architect Liberty Global
2017 - Solution Architect Shell
after 2019 Solution Architect for the following clients:
LEGO, Svitzer, ASML, Galderma, VELUX, Damen Shipyards

profile_positions.description:
1999	System Analyst/Designer front-office treasury system. Trainer of end-users on front-office treasury system. Advisor on security system for Singapore. Y2K and Euro preparations for various systems
1998	Technical liaison to come up with recommendation for changing the platform of the private banking system. Test manager for front-office treasury system (powered by Reuters).
1997	Assistant project manager for Kenya implementation. Project manager for the upgrade of the general ledger system in Turkey and assisted in the Lebanon implementation. Technical project manager for the Russian Rouble denomination (01-01-1998)
1995/1997	Member of support team for project managers. The projects were all over the globe and the support activities were both technical and functional. The system that needed to be implemented was the bank’s general ledger system
1994/1995	Developing and testing system for secuity trades
